task: Give me a list of things I need to do to scaffold UI

plannerResult.raw_task: Give me a list of things I need to do to scaffold UI

subtasks.name: agent-requirements-brief
subtasks.objective: identify product goals, target users, core screens, and constraints to define what the UI scaffold must cover

subtasks.name: agent-tech-stack-decisions
subtasks.objective: recommend framework, styling approach, component library, routing/state choices, and project conventions before scaffolding

subtasks.name: agent-scaffold-checklist
subtasks.objective: produce an ordered checklist to set up project skeleton, layout primitives, navigation, shared components, and placeholder pages

subtasks.name: agent-quality-gates
subtasks.objective: define readiness checks for responsiveness, accessibility, performance basics, and CI/lint/test guardrails
